name: A/V Club
description:
A/V Club is an NES-styled game with arcade/puzzle-like gameplay.  The goal of the game is to stop the Static before it reaches the end of the lanes by shooting it with your lasers.

The game has an instructions menu that explains more about it, how to play, controls, etc.

This was made for the NESJam that took place throughout September 2014, and features music/sounds made by Tim Rurkowski.  Everything else was done by myself in Game Maker: Studio.

If you'd like to support me, feel free to use the button above and donate.  Any amount is greatly appreciated!

**NOTE: Use the Shift Key to switch between the options on the title screen.  Shift is often used as the Select Button on emulators, but I couldn't find a way to show that in the game.**
